sentences.en: " The magistrates are God - fearing gentlemen, but merciful overmuch -- that is a truth, " added a third autumnal matron.
sentences.cn: “ 那帮官老爷都是敬神的先生, 可惜慈悲心太重 —— 这可是真事, ” 第三个人老珠黄的婆娘补充说.

sentences.en: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.
sentences.cn: 3主阿,求你怜悯我, 因我终日求告你.

sentences.en: Blessed are the merciful, for they will be shown mercy.
sentences.cn: 7怜恤人的人有福了, 因为他们必蒙怜恤.

sentences.en: He had a kind heart and did merciful deeds.
sentences.cn: 他非常善良,经常做善事.

sentences.en: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.
sentences.cn: 26他终日恩待人,借给人. 他的后裔也蒙福.

sentences.en: If so, then a being cannot be perfectly just and perfectly merciful.
sentences.cn: 如果那么, 那么一是不能是完美地就并且完美地仁慈.

sentences.en: Lord, be merciful to us , we shall be all lost, we shall be all undone.
sentences.cn: 主啊! 慈悲吧!我们都要完蛋了, 我们都要毁了.
仁慈的上帝，救救我们吧。

sentences.en: P : Then Shylock must be merciful. He must have mercy on Antonio.
sentences.cn: 那么夏洛克必须很仁慈, 他必须宽恕你.

sentences.en: Rest and peace steal over his features like the merciful moonlight over a desolate landscope.
sentences.cn: 安静和舒适的表情悄悄掠过他的眉宇就象慈祥的月光照在凄凉的景物上面一般.

sentences.en: She showed mercy to the orphan. She is a merciful lady.
sentences.cn: 她怜悯那个孤儿, 是个仁慈的妇女.

sentences.en: She will put her hands together and pray you to be merciful.
sentences.cn: 我要合拢双手祈求你的怜悯.

sentences.en: The merciful king saved him from death.
The prisoner besought the judge for mercy / to be merciful.
sentences.cn: 囚犯恳求法官宽恕[乞求宽大].

sentences.en: They asked her to be merciful to the prisoners.
sentences.cn: 他们要她对犯人慈悲为怀。

sentences.en: Woman: It is said that you are a just but merciful man.
sentences.cn: 妇女: 据说你是个正直仁慈的人.

words.tran_cn: 仁慈，宽容；怜悯；幸运；善行

trans.tran_cn: 仁慈的，宽恕的，温和的，（情形）良好的，顺利的，（处罚）宽大的
trans.tran_en: being kind to people and forgiving them rather than punishing them or being cruel
